languages.text: {n}Уралон закрывает глаза и символы, вырезанные на его лице, начинают пылать.{/n} "Я не могу узреть, что именно задумал Пес Простора — я ведаю лишь, что у него в руках ключ, и этот ключ должен достаться тебе. Лишь на одной из троп ты озарен багровым венцом Последнего восхода. На остальных — забвение и погибель".

{n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."
languages.original_text: {n}Уралон закрывает глаза и символы, вырезанные на его лице, начинают пылать.{/n} "Я не могу узреть, что именно задумал Пес Простора — я ведаю лишь, что у него в руках ключ, и этот ключ должен достаться тебе. Лишь на одной из троп ты озарен багровым венцом Последнего восхода. На остальных — забвение и погибель".

All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."

languages.text: {n}Uralon ferme les yeux et les symboles gravés sur son visage s'illuminent comme des braises.{/n} « Les projets du chien de garde des Étendues ne m'ont pas été révélés. Tout ce que je sais, c'est qu'il détient une clé et qu'il nous faut nous en emparer. Une seule voie vous conduira à l'illumination et à la couronne écarlate de l'Aube finale. Les autres ne mènent qu'à la mort et au néant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon ferme les yeux et les symboles gravés sur son visage s'illuminent comme des braises.{/n} « Les projets du chien de garde des Étendues ne m'ont pas été révélés. Tout ce que je sais, c'est qu'il détient une clé et qu'il nous faut nous en emparer. Une seule voie vous conduira à l'illumination et à la couronne écarlate de l'Aube finale. Les autres ne mènent qu'à la mort et au néant. »

languages.text: {n}Uralon cierra los ojos y los símbolos grabados en su carne se encienden como ascuas.{/n} «No puedo percibir lo que planea el perro guardián de la Extensión. Solo sé que posee una llave y que debes arrebatársela. Solo una senda te llevará a portar la corona carmesí del Amanecer Final. Las demás conducen al olvido y a la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon cierra los ojos y los símbolos grabados en su carne se encienden como ascuas.{/n} «No puedo percibir lo que planea el perro guardián de la Extensión. Solo sé que posee una llave y que debes arrebatársela. Solo una senda te llevará a portar la corona carmesí del Amanecer Final. Las demás conducen al olvido y a la muerte».

languages.text: {n}ウラロンが目を閉じると、顔に刻まれたシンボルが炎のように燃え上がる。{/n}「エクスパンスの番人が何を企んでいるのか、私にはわからぬ。わかっているのは、彼が鍵を握っているということだけだ。最後の夜明けの深紅の花輪に輝くのは、ただ一つの道だけだ。残りは忘却と死のみ」
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンが目を閉じると、顔に刻まれたシンボルが炎のように燃え上がる。{/n}「エクスパンスの番人が何を企んでいるのか、私にはわからぬ。わかっているのは、彼が鍵を握っているということだけだ。最後の夜明けの深紅の花輪に輝くのは、ただ一つの道だけだ。残りは忘却と死のみ」

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆闭上双眼，刻在他脸上的印记变得如同火焰一般明亮。{/n}“我不知道科罗努斯扩区的看门狗有什么打算。我只知道他手中掌握着一把钥匙，而那把钥匙必将归你所有。只有一条道路能指引你戴上终末黎明深红色的花冠，其余的道路只有湮灭与死亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆闭上双眼，刻在他脸上的印记变得如同火焰一般明亮。{/n}“我不知道科罗努斯扩区的看门狗有什么打算。我只知道他手中掌握着一把钥匙，而那把钥匙必将归你所有。只有一条道路能指引你戴上终末黎明深红色的花冠，其余的道路只有湮灭与死亡。”

languages.text: {n}Uralon schließt seine Augen und die Symbole auf seinem Gesicht erstrahlen wie glühende Kohlen.{/n} "Ich erkenne nicht, was der Wachhund der Ausdehnung plant. Ich weiß nur, dass er einen Schlüssel besitzt, an den wir gelangen müssen. Es gibt nur einen Weg, der Euch mit dem blutroten Zorn der letzten Dämmerung erleuchten wird. Auf allen anderen erwartet Euch nichts als Tod und Vergessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon schließt seine Augen und die Symbole auf seinem Gesicht erstrahlen wie glühende Kohlen.{/n} "Ich erkenne nicht, was der Wachhund der Ausdehnung plant. Ich weiß nur, dass er einen Schlüssel besitzt, an den wir gelangen müssen. Es gibt nur einen Weg, der Euch mit dem blutroten Zorn der letzten Dämmerung erleuchten wird. Auf allen anderen erwartet Euch nichts als Tod und Vergessen."

languages.text: {n}Uralon'un gözlerini kapatmasıyla yüzüne kazınmış semboller, kor gibi yanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Enginlik'in bekçi köpeğinin ne planladığını algılayamıyorum. Tek bildiğim bir anahtar tuttuğu ve bu anahtarın senin olması gerektiği. Seni Nihai Şafak'ın kızıl tacıyla aydınlatacak olan tek bir yol var. Gerisi sadece yok oluş ve ölüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon closes his eyes, and the symbols carved into his face flare like embers.{/n} "I cannot perceive what the watchdog of the Expanse is planning. All I know is that he holds a key, and that key must be yours. Only one path will see you alight with the crimson wreath of the Final Dawn. The rest hold only oblivion and death."
